item.title: About
item.description: Welcome to Mora Cyber Insights. This is a personal blog where I’ll be posting about attack spotlights from a honeypot, CTF write-ups, independent research, malware analysis, investigation scenarios, and anything related to DFIR. All content posted here is personal and does not reflect the view of my employer(s).

item.title: Miner
item.description: Is your computer mining for someone elseâ€™s gold? Link to heading By Gabriel Mora Introduction In the ever-evolving landscape of cybersecurity understanding and mitigating attacks is crucial. Recently, my honeypot detected an intriguing crypto-mining attack originating from China. This blog post details my investigation shedding light on the methods used. The Incident On May 6th, 2024 my honeypot was targeted by a malicious actor attempting to deploy a crypto-mining payload.

item.title: Brute2
item.description: Time and Date of Activity 5/29/2024 3:17:15 AM - 1:51:16 PM Relevant Logs: Link to heading There were 206 firewall logs of attempts made from source IP 159.89.163.155 all to destination port 2222. Sample of the firewall logs: **Date Time Source IP Source Port Dest IP Dest port protocol** 2024-05-29 02:34:37 159.89.163.155 56926 172.31.19.98 2222 6 2024-05-29 02:44:58 159.89.163.155 38986 172.31.19.98 2222 6 2024-05-29 02:46:00 159.89.163.155 56076 172.31.19.98 2222 6 2024-05-29 02:47:01 159.

item.title: SIPrecon
ea73Malware
item.description: Time and Date of Activity 2024-05-25 13:19:55 Relevant Logs, Malware Analysis: Link to heading There were 2 firewall logs for this IP. They were obtained manually from the honeypot by going to “/var/log” and using “grep -r ‘218.92.0.60’” to filter by source IP of the attacker. **Date Time Source IP Source Port Target IP Target Port Protocol 2024-05-22 23:34:46 218.92.0.60 55026 172.31.19.98 22 6 2024-05-25 13:19:55 218.92.0.60 19903 172.31.19.98 22 6 Looked in the “/srv/cowrie/var/lib/cowrie/downloads” directory to see recent downloads.

item.title: Crypto Malware Observation
item.description: Time and Date of Activity 2024-05-25 07:11:48 Relevant Logs, Malware Analysis: Link to heading There were 4 firewall logs. All from Source IP “151.115.58.49” using source ports “42256 & 42266”. Logs were obtained from the ISC portal. **Date Time Source IP Source Port Target IP Target Port Protocol 2024-05-25 07:11:48 151.115.58.49 42256 172.31.19.98 22 6 2024-05-25 07:11:49 151.115.58.49 42266 172.31.19.98 22 6 2024-05-25 07:11:48 151.115.58.49 42256 172.31.19.98 22 6 2024-05-25 07:11:49 151.

item.title: Mining Attack Spotlight
item.description: Time and Date of Activity 06 May 2024 02:54 Relevant Logs, Malware Analysis Link to heading There were 2 firewall logs for the source IP “39.108.186.231” that was tracked. **Date Time Source IP Source Port Target IP Target Port Protocol** 2024-05-06 02:54:17 39.108.186.231 16525 172.31.19.98 2222 6 2024-05-06 02:54:28 39.108.186.231 37700 172.31.19.98 2222 6 Firewall data was obtained through the ISC portal. To choose the attack to research the “playlog” feature of the honeypot was used to investigate some attacks that took place.

item.title: Recon
item.description: Time and Date of Activity 05 May 2024 5:36:11-5:36:12 Relevant Logs Link to heading There were 4 firewall logs. All to destination port TCP/23: Date Time Source IP Source Port Target IP Target Port Protocol 2024-05-05 05:36:11 213.171.36.194 37640 172.31.19.98 23 6 2024-05-05 05:36:11 213.171.36.194 46818 172.31.19.98 23 6 2024-05-05 05:36:11 213.171.36.194 37640 172.31.19.98 23 6 2024-05-05 05:36:11 213.171.36.194 46818 172.31.19.98 23 6 There was 1 telnet log: "213.171.36.194": {"try": 0, "max": 1, "user": "b'ubnt'", "pw": "b'ubnt'"}

item.title: Brute Force Attack
item.description: Time and Date of Activity 18 February 2024 4:46:25-5:17:02 UTC Relevant Logs Link to heading There were 1412 firewall logs. All to destination port TCP/2222. There were 688 SSH/Telnet logs. All using the “root” username. Reviewing all logs for the month of February there was no other activity originating from this IP (162.14.74.230). Sample of the Firewall logs: Date, Time, Source IP, Source Port, Destination IP, Destination port, protocol 2024-02-18 00:00:00 0001-01-01 04:46:25 162.
